name: fixelconnectivity
description:
Generate a fixel-fixel connectivity matrix.

This command will generate a directory containing three images, which encodes the fixel-fixel connectivity matrix. Documentation regarding this format and how to use it will come in the future.

References:
author: Robert E. Smith (robert.smith@florey.edu.au)

inputs.name: fixel_directory
inputs.description: the directory containing the fixels between which connectivity will be quantified

inputs.name: tracks
inputs.description: the tracks used to determine fixel-fixel connectivity

inputs.name: matrix
inputs.description: the output fixel-fixel connectivity matrix directory path

inputs.name: threshold
inputs.description: a threshold to define the required fraction of shared connections to be included in the neighbourhood (default: 0.01)

inputs.name: angle
inputs.description: the max angle threshold for assigning streamline tangents to fixels (Default: 45 degrees)

inputs.name: mask
inputs.description: provide a fixel data file containing a mask of those fixels to be computed; fixels outside the mask will be empty in the output matrix

inputs.name: quiet
inputs.description: do not display information messages or progress status; alternatively, this can be achieved by setting the MRTRIX_QUIET environment variable to a non-empty string.

inputs.name: force
inputs.description: force overwrite of output files (caution: using the same file as input and output might cause unexpected behaviour).

inputs.name: nthreads
inputs.description: use this number of threads in multi-threaded applications (set to 0 to disable multi-threading).

inputs.name: config
inputs.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

type.name: config
type.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

inputs.name: key
inputs.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

inputs.name: value
inputs.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

inputs.name: help
inputs.description: display this information page and exit.

output-files.name: matrix
output-files.description: the output fixel-fixel connectivity matrix directory path
